title: Evernote for Writers: Streamline Your Writing from Idea to Final Manuscript with Evernote
description: Are you a writer of fiction or non-fiction, a blogger or maybe a student struggling to write your term paper or thesis? Do you want to streamline your writing process from initial idea to finished manuscript and work more efficiently? Do you want to organize all your material in one place and have access to it everywhere no matter what kind of material it is? With Evernote and this book you can do all that and much more. Evernote for Writers: Streamline Your Writing from Idea to Finished Manuscript with Evernote shows you how you can organize, structure, work with and save all your material in one place so that you can work faster and with more control whether you are at home or on the go.
author: Rhiana B. Seeley
